event.name: PAVONIAN_GIFT
event.text: The Pavonian vessel contacts you and offers some supplies for free. A rainbow-colored face appears on the comm: "I sense positive vibes around your ship."

event.name: PAVONIAN_FIND_DRONE
event.text: While many races use slaves for hard physical work, the Pavonians prefer drones. A Pavonian colony, sympathetic to Federation, offers to install a drone useful in combat on your ship for free.

event.name: PAVONIAN_SUPERVOLCANO
event.text: The distress signal is coming from a small Pavonian colony on a surface of a nearby moon. Scans show that the colony is located near a supervolcano, so you make a guess that distress signal is related to that.

choice.text: Send a shuttle to the colony.

event.text: Your inital assumptions were correct: the supervolcano will erupt in mere hours. The Pavonians beg you to take them off the planet but there is no room for everyone in the shuttle.

choice.text: Save as many souls as we can.

event.text: Your crew collects as many Pavonians as they can as quickly as possible before they can understand what is going on. As you take off with half the colony rescued and the other left to die, the Pavonians are devastated but do not object. You are offered a reward for saving them on a nearby planet.

You allow the Pavonians to choose who will be evacuated and who will be left to die. "We don't understand. Either take us all or leave us all". There is no point in talking to these folks. The community is more important than personal survival for them.

choice.text: Land the ship and save all Pavonians.

event.text: You contact the pilot left on the ship and order to land immediately. There is no time to lose: all of the colony members are organized and evacuated. Just as the ship takes off, the eruption starts, the hull and some systems are critically damaged by it. The Pavonians are very grateful: one of them offers to join your crew.
You just cannot stand this rainbow-colored snobs. There is no way they're getting on your ship. This is a Federation military operation, not animal rescue.

As you land, one of the Pavonian colonists greets you. "Things are getting a little wonky here. The drones have become a bit sick and do not do their jobs anymore." It's difficult to understand what the Pavonian means exaclty. Then, a combat drone attacks you from air and kills the Pavonian. Now, everything is clear.

choice.text: Help the Pavonians by defeating the drone uprising.

event.text: The drones have killed an unarmed civilian and that's enough for you to unleash all of Federation weaponry on them. They're defeated soon and one of the surviving Pavonians is inspired to join your crew.

choice.text: Help the drones by killing the Pavonians for them.

event.text: If the drones attacked their masters, there probably was a valid reason for that. You enter the colony with guns blazing, killing every Pavonian on sight. The drones have no means to express their gratitude but at least they don't attack you. You loot the colony.
Since you didn't attack them directly, the drones do not see you as an enemy. Your crew reaches the ship safely.

event.name: PAVONIAN_OUT_OF_FUEL
event.text: A distress signal is being sent by a lonely Pavonian ship drifting in space. As soon as they saw you entering the system, one of the Pavoians contacts you: "I have a bad feeling about this. Our ship needs to be elsewhere but there is no way we could jump. Any ideas?"

"Oh, that's exactly what we needed for another jump. I'm afraid we have nothing to offer you now, but if you follow us, we can share some stuff." The Pavonians jump away, and you get ready to follow them.
